Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I've made this base and landed it on the mun according to the contract highlighted top right. It is wheeled, but the contract wont recognize that it is. Shouldn't landing gear count, seeing as those are wheels?

http://clip2net.com/s/3hlCK9x
It might be looking only for rover wheels.

The contract should be pretty explicit, but you shouldn't get that contract if the correct wheels are not available.

And yeah airplane gear isn't suitable sorry.

Is there any plan to change the wording? Or possibly add landing gear to the acceptable list?

It's a little ridiculous to have something this misleading in 1.0x

No, landing gears are acceptable and the contract does detect them, just not the small gear bay. It currently has some collider issues that stop it from properly triggering ground collisions. It's detecting the wheel, just not that it is on the ground.
Is there any way to force it to detect?
You could edit the persistence file or use a contract mod - maybe if you bounce into the ground hard enough it'll detect
